summary: Bonaire is a Caribbean island and a special part of the Netherlands. It's known for its beautiful beaches, reefs, and diving spots. The capital is Kralendijk. Bonaire, along with Aruba and Cura√ßao, forms the ABC islands near Venezuela. With a population of around 24,000, it has grown a lot since 2012. The island is about 38 kilometers long and 5-8 kilometers wide, with an uninhabited islet, Klein Bonaire, nearby. Bonaire was part of the Netherlands Antilles until 2010. Most people living there are Dutch nationals or born in the former Netherlands Antilles and Aruba.
title: Bonaire
